definition: to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth
actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Reid died trying to kick his habit in a sanitarium.
sentences.chinese: 這是戒毒前期，裏德在療養所試圖戒毒時死去。
